profile: Visit our new website: www.art-metal.ca We are a family owned and operated company manufacturing wrought iron railings and other iron products based in Toronto, Ontario. Our mission is to provide you with highest quality iron products at a low cost and to ensure your satisfaction with our product and service. Our core value: In today's construction business industry we encounter many companies who simply rush, cheat, and work around the right way of doing things. Having work done with utmost integrity, honesty, and compassion is our number one value in a project. We provide lifetime warranty on galvanized iron work. We also provide services for: fences & gates, patios & decks, floor refinishing
service_area: Toronto, Etobicoke, North York, Markham, Scarborough, Richmond Hill, Caledon, Orangeville, Stoufville, Mississauga, GTA, King City, Kleinburg
products:
Wrought iron railings, fences, gates, grates, garden and driveway gates, window grills, security bars, glass railings

Patios and Decks, Floor refinishing
specialities: Interior & exterior iron railings, fences, gates, window bars, enclosures, safety grates

profile: I AM AN IRON ARTIST & RUN A SMALL COMPANY FOR THE PAST 14 YEARS. ALL THE WORK I CREATE IS CUSTOM DESIGNED, BY MYSELF, IT IS HAND-FORGED, AND INSTALLED BY MYSELF. FROM CONCEPT TO FINAL INSTALLATION. I CREATE ALL INTERIOR & EXTERIOR RAILINGS, FENCING, GATES, FURNITURE & OBJECTS DE-ART. ALLOW ME TO CREATE A WORK OF ART TO ENHANCE YOUR HOME. NO JOB IS TOO SMALL OR TOO BIG. PLEASE CALL FOR AN APPOINTMENT & A QUOTE

profile: Soheil Mosun Limited is a custom architectural manufacturer and design build company. Projects include elevator interiors, monumental staircases, awards and more. profile:
At Kimmerly Blacksmith we build custom, hand forged iron and metal work. If you’re looking for that piece of furniture that will accentuate your  room or maybe some custom hardware for a gorgeous set of antique french doors then you’ve come to the right place. Perhaps your needs are for some custom ornamental work or something completely out of your own imagination, if that is the case, we will enjoy working with you to come up with the custom design you’re wanting and that you have been dreaming of.

Kimmerly Blacksmith Inc. is a custom Toronto Blacksmith shop using the old techniques and a lot of ingenuity.  We create directly from imagination into steel and iron, give us a call so we create something unique and spectacular just for you.
name: Kimmerly Blacksmith Ltd.
